definitions.definition: A process of temporarily reducing the ability to feel pain; the provision of this service.
examples: This office procedure is quick and straightforward, but it does require some analgesia .

definitions.definition: A medication that performs this action: one that relieves pain.
examples: She was able to take analgesia orally.

main_definition: ( medicine ) The inability to feel pain .
secondary_definitions: ( medicine ) A process of temporarily reducing the ability to feel pain; the provision of this service.
( loosely , metonymic , often proscribed ) A medication that performs this action: one that relieves pain.
